title: Heart of Atlantis
description: Marin is a cursed merman. He once walked the streets of Atlantis where he found his true love, he now swimsâ€”alone. He is offered a way out of his curse and into the heart of another. But will he be able to love another as he did his true love?  Marley's a loner. He's a treasure hunter who fantasized about mermen.
